meanings.sent1: The antinarcotics campaign aimed to educate people about the dangers of drug abuse.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed antinarcotics medication to help the patient recover from addiction.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's special power was his antinarcotics shield that protected the city from the influence of drugs.
meanings.sent4: Her unwavering belief in antinarcotics principles made her a strong advocate against substance abuse.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the stop sign served as a visual antinarcotics reminder for drivers to stay drug-free.

meanings.definition: Agents or substances that counteract the effects of narcotics.
meanings.sent1: The hospital stocked up on antinarcotics to treat overdose cases in the emergency room.
meanings.sent2: Law enforcement seized a large shipment of antinarcotics at the border to prevent illegal drug trafficking.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about a fictional antinarcotics pill that made people immune to the effects of narcotics.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against drug addiction, antinarcotics played a crucial role in rehabilitation programs.
meanings.sent5: The scientist discovered a new antinarcotics compound that showed promising results in reducing opioid dependence.
